fields.description: Right now delta information is generated between coverage data sets, but more detailed lists of APIs needs to be generated.
fields.summary: Drillbit: Implement delta tracking in coverage generation

comments.body:
To generate the delta report:

Download the coverage seed.json from 20110718 as "seed-20110718.json":
http://builds.appcelerator.com.s3.amazonaws.com/coverage/mobile-1.8.0-20110718/seed.json

Download the coverage seed.json from 20110725 as "seed-20110725.json":
http://builds.appcelerator.com.s3.amazonaws.com/coverage/mobile-1.8.0-20110725/seed.json

Generate and open the coverage report like so:
{code}
$ ./drillbit/coverage/coverage.py --seed=seed-20110725.json --delta-seed=seed-20110718.json -w
$ open dist/coverage/delta.html
{code}
Closing ticket due to time passed.
